comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: The clouds look scary, but I'll give it a go.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Once again I have lunch plans today. I am free for the rest of the week during lunch - I promise!

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: You guys need a jalopy-turned-hot-dog stand to motivate you?! A whip might be better. Get crackin, boys!

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: Greg and I had a nice ride up a cloudy Sunshine Canyon today. The overcast skies and cool temperatures were quite a contrast from yesterday's heat. There were lots of other riders on the road today. We figured that they were doing some scouting for this Saturday's Sunshine Canyon Hill Climb.

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: That's a bar Steve. We wouldn't be motivated by hot dogs!
